channel.title: REPLs on Apache Flink
channel.description: Recent content in REPLs on Apache Flink

item.title: Python REPL
item.description: Python REPL # Flink comes with an integrated interactive Python Shell. It can be used in a local setup as well as in a cluster setup. See the standalone resource provider page for more information about how to setup a local Flink. You can also build a local setup from source. Note The Python Shell will run the command “python”. Please refer to the Python Table API installation guide on how to set up the Python execution environments.
